Repair datasets

This option allows repairing PDB file with some missing labels like TER, END, HELIX, SHEET, TURN, etc. It is located in the Option menu ( ). First the input and output directory must be loaded, and then the options can be configured.

First the input and output directory must load, and then configure the options.

Options:

  • Replace datasets: replace the originals files with the new fixed ones.
  • Repair secondary structure: this option repairs secondary structure lines in the PDB file by using DSSP files with the same name, computed in the DSSP program available at: ftp://ftp.cmbi.ru.nl/pub/software/dssp
